title: Belgian Sensation De Lie Benched and Blasted after Loss of Form: ‘It’s Not Enough to Live 90 Percent for Your Sport’
content:
Team Lotto questions struggling speedster De Lie's commitment after cutting Dwars and Flanders from his program in hopes of stalling a slide in performance.

Read the full article at Belgian Sensation De Lie Benched and Blasted after Loss of Form: ‘It’s Not Enough to Live 90 Percent for Your Sport’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
